review: Love the Fire Stick! We have a Samsung Smart TV, and unfortunately many apps were missing from their App Store. We decided then we would need a streaming device to augment Samsung's shortcomings. After much debate and comparison we settled on the Fire Stick. It's been fantastic! We now have all the apps we could want or need! It's a no brainier with a Prime membership, we love the added features of getting to stream Prime music and see all our Amazon Photos on the TV.
